long_description: The durable Thule Coaster 2 Bike Trailer provides a safe, comfortable ride for 2 children. It quickly transforms to a stroller once you reach your destination. Secure attachment to bike using Thule's patented ezHitch(TM). On-board storage of strolling wheel makes it easy to convert from cycling to strolling. Includes extra storage space for hauling around cargo. HeightRight(TM) adjustable handlebar for your comfort while you're strolling around. The Thule Coaster 2 Bike Trailer folds up easily for storage and transporting.
short_description: The durable Thule Coaster 2 Bike Trailer provides a safe, comfortable ride for 2 children. It quickly transforms to a stroller once you reach your destination.
